description: It seems a little bird has told Miles Taylor a pretty saucy secret about Zak Bishop. Rumor has it, Zak is not only the neighborhood slut, he also gives the best blowjobs on the block, and Miles is pretty sure both of those rumors are true, especially considering how easy it was to talk Zak into going down on him. Miles is ready to have his way with Zak's skinny body and little bubble butt, and Zak, to his credit, is rock hard at the idea of taking a pounding. He taunts Miles to fuck him harder, and Miles obliges, choking Zak as he goes in and out. Zak mounts Miles and strokes his rock hard dick, spitting his load as Miles pulls out and blasts him with his load. Satisfied that Zak has lived up to the hype Miles grins, while Zak confesses he made the rumors up himself, just to lure Miles out of the closet. Looks like someone else is about to join the rumor mill! Enjoy!
title: Rumor Slut
